definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: One of the easiest ways to compare galaxies is to compare their magnitudes .
sentences.chinese: 比较星系的最简单方法之一是比较它们的星等。

sentences.english: Astronomers describe star brightness in terms of magnitude and luminosity.
sentences.chinese: 天文学家用星等和光度来描述恒星的亮度。

sentences.english: Attach magnitude labels to bright stars?
sentences.chinese: 附加星等标签到光亮恒星？

sentences.english: One of the easiest ways to compare galaxies is to compare their magnitudes.
sentences.chinese: 比较星系最简单的一个方法是比较它们的星等。

sentences.english: When checked, magnitude labels are attached to the brighter stars.
sentences.chinese: 当已选取，星等标签会附加到较亮的恒星。

sentences.english: The interplanetary magnetic field fluctuates greatly in magnitude and direction.
sentences.chinese: 行星际磁场在不同的星等和方向强度差别很大。

definition: epsilon Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
constellation (arch., now 星座)/one of the 28 constellations of traditional Chinese astronomy and astrology/motion of stars since one's birth (predetermining one's fate in astrology)
beta Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
delta Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
gamma Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
the ecliptic (the plane of the solar system)
to bewilder/to dazzle and confuse/the planet Mars
alpha Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
the seven planets of premodern astronomy (the Sun, the Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, and Saturn)
bright/glorious/one of the seven planets of premodern astronomy
